skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Herumar was birthed and raised by a pack of warhounds, never knowing the touch of human kindness. He is more the kindred spirit of his hounds than he is of any man.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Blessed by Khorne, the hounds from Herumar's kennels are just as vicious as the most rabid of the berserkers who follow the Blood God.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Weapon Strength: +15% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +9 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Weapon Strength: +20% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Herumar has instilled an innate instinct for survival in his hounds. Which has also enhanced their speed across the field of battle.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +10% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +20% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +9 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +30% for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Under the skilled ministrations of Herumar, hounds that others would discard as broken and wasted are returned to the fight, sent forth to slaughter Khorne's enemies once more.
More than one Chieftain who has refused Herumar's offers has ended his days with his bones fashioned into crude armour for one of the pack leaders.

effects.description:
Armour: +30 for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The many years Herumar has spent with his warhounds has led to the current almost-daemonic beasts, nearly perfect in their ability to fly across a battlefield and smash into the bodies of their foes.

effects.description:
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description:
Attribute: Glorious Charge for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.
No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.
"Sacrifice in the Blood God's name, and soak in the blessings of his favour!"
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%

skillTree.localised_description: A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: Crafted from the skull of the first alpha that led Herumar’s ferocious hounds, this helm is not only a symbol of leadership but also a repository of primal power. The skull, oversized and robust, has been preserved and reinforced with dark metals, its surface etched with runes that thrum with malevolent energy. When Herumar howls through the helm, his voice is amplified and redoubled by the strange magics of Khorne's rage, inspiring his pack and terrifying his foes.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

items.colour_text: Forged from the iron collars of the most ferocious warhounds that once roamed the realms of Chaos, each link in its chain carries the weight of a beast’s ferocity. The flail’s head is adorned with spikes, each one imbued with the essence of a hound’s snarl and bite. When swung in battle, it howls with the voices of a thousand fallen hounds, striking terror into the hearts of all who hear it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Herumar is a houndmaster of great renown in the northern wastes, always ready to sell warhounds to those who have the coin or plunder to pay. He has no truck with those who seek to steal his wares, and more than one Chieftain has ended his days as fodder in Herumar's kennels, his bones fashioned into crude armour for one of the pack leaders.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.

effects.description:
Ability: "Distended Bellies" for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description:
Ability: "Whipcrack" for Chaos Warhounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)
